# Blubeez - AI Travel Assistant

> Blubeez is an AI-powered travel planning assistant that helps users create personalized trip itineraries, discover destinations, and book accommodations through natural conversation.

## About Blubeez

Blubeez (https://www.blubeez.ai) is a modern travel planning platform that uses artificial intelligence to help travelers plan their perfect vacation. Users can chat with "blu", our friendly AI travel agent, to:

- Create custom day-by-day travel itineraries
- Discover destinations based on preferences
- Search and book hotels via Booking.com integration
- Save trips and manage wishlists
- Get personalized recommendations based on travel style, budget, and interests

## Key Features

### AI Travel Chat
Natural conversation interface to plan trips. Simply tell blu where you want to go, when, and your preferences - and get a complete itinerary with hotels, activities, and restaurants.

### Interactive Maps
Visualize your entire trip on an interactive map showing hotels, restaurants, attractions, and activities for each day.

### Hotel Booking
Search hotels from Booking.com with filters for price, rating, and amenities. View options, compare prices, and book directly.

### Trip Management
Save your planned trips, create wishlists of destinations, and access your travel history anytime.

### Destination Explorer
Browse destinations by country with curated routes and must-visit places.

## Supported Destinations

Blubeez supports travel planning to destinations worldwide, with special focus on:
- Southeast Asia: Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Philippines, Indonesia, Laos, Cambodia
- South Asia: India, Sri Lanka, Maldives, Nepal
- South America: Peru, Brazil, Argentina, Colombia, Chile
- Europe: All major destinations
- And many more...

## How to Use

1. Visit https://www.blubeez.ai
2. Start chatting with blu by typing your travel request
3. Answer a few questions about your preferences
4. Receive a personalized itinerary
5. Browse hotel options and book your stay
6. Save your trip for future reference

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js and React
- AI powered by GPT-4
- Hotel data from Booking.com API
- Maps powered by Google Maps
- Authentication via Clerk
- Database on Supabase
